name: CDN Image
desc: a CDN image storage using github repo storage, build with express.js and frontend native stack.

name: Realtime Chat App
desc: This is a real-time chat application built using Next.js 14, Socket.IO, and MongoDB. It features user authentication with OTP via WhatsApp, real-time messaging, online/offline status tracking, and a search functionality for messages.

name: Personal Portofolio
desc: This is my second portfolio, built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS and hosted on Vercel

name: Online Qur'an
desc: The website Alquran Kareem allows users to read the Quran online. It provides options to navigate through different surahs (chapters) and ayahs (verses). The site has a clean and user-friendly interface, making it easy for users to access and read the Quranic text.

name: Tiktok Media Downloader
desc: Tools which can help you to download some media from tiktok with fast speed and high quality.

name: Note App
desc: Simple and minimalist note-taking application. It allows users to create, edit, and manage notes efficiently. The interface is clean and straightforward, focusing on providing a distraction-free writing environment.
